caller_intent: Jeff Edmonds from Alliance Insurance aims to obtain a wet signature on a bond application previously completed over the phone, and he is at the Pilot Mountain office to meet Amanda Bryant in person.
resolution_steps: Katie from the Town of Pilot Mountain forwards the call to Amanda Bryant in the finance office.
Amanda asks the caller to leave a voicemail with his name, number, and message for the attorney.
Jeff leaves a message stating his location, time, and contact number for follow-up.
knowledge_required: Understanding the town's call-forwarding protocol for finance office inquiries
Procedures for handling bond applications and wet signatures
systems_referenced: Town of Pilot Mountain phone system
summary: Jeff Edmonds from Alliance Insurance called to follow up on a bond application, aiming to get a wet signature. He left a message for Amanda Bryant, who is in the finance office, requesting a callback. The call was forwarded through the town's system, and the outcome was a message left for Amanda.
